First, functional version. Obsoleted.

class Stem[source]

Stem(c_in=3, stem_sizes=[], stem_out=64, conv_layer=ConvLayer, stride_on=0, stem_bn_last=False, bn_1st=True, stem_use_pool=True, stem_pool=MaxPool2d(kernel_size=3, stride=2, padding=1, dilation=1, ceil_mode=False), **kwargs) :: Sequential

Base stem

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
stem = Stem()
stem

Stem(
  sizes: [3, 64]
  (conv_0): ConvLayer(
    (conv): Conv2d(3, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
  )
  (pool): MaxPool2d(kernel_size=3, stride=2, padding=1, dilation=1, ceil_mode=False)
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

stem

    (bn): BatchNorm2d(32, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
  )
  (conv_1): ConvLayer(
    (conv): Conv2d(32, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
  )

  (conv_0): ConvLayer(
    (conv): Conv2d(3, 32, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    (bn): BatchNorm2d(32, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  )

    (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)

DownsampleBlock[source]

DownsampleBlock(conv_layer, ni, nf, ks, stride, act=False, **kwargs)

Base downsample for res-like blocks

class BasicBlock[source]

BasicBlock(ni, nf, expansion=1, stride=1, zero_bn=False, conv_layer=ConvLayer, act_fn=ReLU(inplace=True), downsample_block=DownsampleBlock, **kwargs) :: Module

Basic block (simplified) as in pytorch resnet

class Bottleneck[source]

Bottleneck(ni, nh, expansion=4, stride=1, zero_bn=False, conv_layer=ConvLayer, act_fn=ReLU(inplace=True), downsample_block=DownsampleBlock, **kwargs) :: Module

Bottleneck block for resnet models

BasicLayer(block, blocks, ni, nf, expansion, stride, sa=False, **kwargs) :: Sequential

class Body[source]

Body(block, body_in=64, body_out=512, bodylayer=BasicLayer, expansion=1, layer_szs=[64, 128, 256], blocks=[2, 2, 2, 2], sa=False, **kwargs) :: Sequential

Constructor for body

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
body = Body(BasicBlock)
body

Body(
  (layer_0): BasicLayer(
    from 64 to 64, 2 blocks, expansion 1.
    (block_0): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(
        (conv_0): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
      )
      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
    (block_1): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(
        (conv_0): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
      )
      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
  )
  (layer_1): BasicLayer(
    from 64 to 128, 2 blocks, expansion 1.
    (block_0): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(
        (conv_0): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(128, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
      )
      (downsample): ConvLayer(
        (conv): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(1, 1), stride=(2, 2), bias=False)
        (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
      )
      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
    (block_1): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(

          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(128, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)

        )

      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
  )
  (layer_2): BasicLayer(
    from 128 to 256, 2 blocks, expansion 1.

          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(256, 256, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(256, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
      )
      (downsample): ConvLayer(
        (conv): Conv2d(128, 256, kernel_size=(1, 1), stride=(2, 2), bias=False)
        (bn): BatchNorm2d(256, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
      )
      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
    (block_1): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(

      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)

    from 256 to 512, 2 blocks, expansion 1.

Body(
  (layer_0): BasicLayer(
    from 64 to 64, 2 blocks, expansion 1.
    (block_0): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(
        (conv_0): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
      )
      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
    (block_1): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(
        (conv_0): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
      )
      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
  )
  (layer_1): BasicLayer(
    from 64 to 128, 2 blocks, expansion 1.
    (block_0): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(
        (conv_0): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(
          (conv): Conv2d(128, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
      )
      (downsample): ConvLayer(
        (conv): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(1, 1), stride=(2, 2), bias=False)
        (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
      )
      (merge): Noop()
      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
    (block_1): BasicBlock(
      (conv): Sequential(

          (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
          (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        )
        (conv_1): ConvLayer(

        )

      (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
  )

    from 128 to 256, 2 blocks, expansion 1.

          (bn): BatchNorm2d(256, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)

        )
      )

class Net[source]

Net(stem=Stem, body=Body, block=BasicBlock, sa=False, layer_szs=[64, 128, 256], blocks=[2, 2, 2, 2], head=Head, c_in=3, num_classes=1000, body_in=64, body_out=512, expansion=1, init_fn=init_model, **kwargs) :: Sequential

Constructor for model

model = Net()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
model

Net(
  (stem): Stem(
    sizes: [3, 64]
    (conv_0): ConvLayer(
      (conv): Conv2d(3, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
      (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
      (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
    (pool): MaxPool2d(kernel_size=3, stride=2, padding=1, dilation=1, ceil_mode=False)
  )
  (body): Body(
    (layer_0): BasicLayer(
      from 64 to 64, 2 blocks, expansion 1.
      (block_0): BasicBlock(
        (conv): Sequential(
          (conv_0): ConvLayer(
            (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
            (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
            (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
          )
          (conv_1): ConvLayer(
            (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
            (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
          )
        )
        (merge): Noop()
        (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
      )
      (block_1): BasicBlock(
        (conv): Sequential(
          (conv_0): ConvLayer(
            (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
            (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
            (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
          )
          (conv_1): ConvLayer(
            (conv): Conv2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
            (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
          )
        )
        (merge): Noop()
        (act_conn): ReLU(inplace=True)
      )
    )
    (layer_1): BasicLayer(
      from 64 to 128, 2 blocks, expansion 1.
      (block_0): BasicBlock(
        (conv): Sequential(
          (conv_0): ConvLayer(
            (conv): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
            (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
            (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
          )

            (conv): Conv2d(128, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
            (bn): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)

Net(
  (stem): Stem(
    sizes: [3, 64]
    (conv_0): ConvLayer(
      (conv): Conv2d(3, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
      (bn): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
      (act_fn): ReLU(inplace=True)
    )
    (pool): MaxPool2d(kernel_size=3, stride=2, padding=1, dilation=1, ceil_mode=False)
  )

      from 64 to 64, 2 blocks, expansion 1.
